Class TetrisBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • TetrisBoard

  • public class TetrisBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    The TetrisBoard class represents the model: a board on which Tetris is played; it maintains the grid (the block matrix) and the current piece.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vi Nguyen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NUM_COLS
      Number of columns in board
      static int NUM_ROWS
      Number of row in board

      Check if there is a block in the row and column

      Update the board array to reflect the newly landed piece's filled squares using the currentGridPosition values and the currentPiece's rotation value

      • landPiece

        public void landPiece()
        Update the board array to reflect the newly landed piece's filled squares using the currentGridPosition values and the currentPiece's rotation value

      • moveLeft

        public boolean moveLeft()
        Check if moving left is valid. If so, move the current piece left
        Returns:
        true if valid move was performed

      • moveRight

        public boolean moveRight()
        Check if moving right is valid. If so, move the current piece right
        Returns:
        true if valid move was performed

      • moveDown

        public boolean moveDown()
        Check if moving down is valid. If so, move the current piece down
        Returns:
        true if valid move was performed

      • rotateCW

        public boolean rotateCW()
        Check if rotating clockwise is valid. If so, rotate the current piece clockwise by 90 degrees
        Returns:
        true if valid move was performed

      • rotateCCW

        public boolean rotateCCW()
        Check if rotating counter-clockwise is valid. If so, rotate the current piece counter-clockwise by 90 degrees
        Returns:
        true if valid move was performed

      • numberOfFormedLines

        public int numberOfFormedLines()
        Detect and remove any lines formed
        Returns:
        the total number found

      • hasBlock

                        int col)
        Check if there is a block in the row and column
        Parameters:
        row - row
        col - column
        Returns:
        true if there is a block
